key_authorization_email_not_verified: You account's email is not verified
key_bad_request_already_verified: This account's email has already verified
key_internal_error_no_secret_code: Can't find account secret code. Please contact support
key_internal_error_wrong_passcode: The secret code is incorrect, Please try again
key_internal_error_can_not_validate_pass: Can't validate passcode. User not found
key_duplicate_constraint_community_ident: This community id is already taken
key_validate_max_5_doc: Please upload no more than 5 documents
key_forbidden_permission_required: You don't have permission for this action
key_forbidden_not_a_member: You are not a member of this community
key_forbidden_can_not_join_community: You can't join this community. Please contact community admin for more information
key_forbidden_can_not_accept_invitation: You can't accept this invitation. Please contact community admin for more information
key_forbidden_delete_member: You don't have permission to delete this member
key_forbidden_wait_x_second: Please wait {second} second(s) before you can request again
